#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Player.

= Description =

The Player element contains information about a golfer: Personal data, owned equipment, statistics, rounds played.

= Attributes =

The element has the following attributes:

# id - Unique identifier.

= Elements = 

== Descriptive Elements ==

The element has the following descriptive elements:

 # name
 # address
 # phone
 # email
 # note
 # handicap

== Structural Elements ==

The element has the following structural elements:

 # [[Equipment]]
 # [[Statistics]]
 # [[Games]]
